title: Andhra University: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Andhra University Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Andhra University Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Andhra University Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: Andhra University Courses and Fees
description: Andhra University offers UG, PG and Ph.D. programs in the disciplines of Arts, Science, Commerce, Law, Medical, etc. Every program has different selection criteria. The course details and annual fees of popular courses offered at Andhra University are tabulated below:

basic_info.name: Andhra University Admissions
description: Andhra University offers UG, PG, and Ph.D. courses in various disciplines. Admission to UG and PG courses is on merit in qualifying exams or state-level or university-level entrance examinations such as AUEET, AUSIB, AP ECET, AP EAPCET, etc. However, for the B.Arch program, national-level exams such as NATA scores are considered. Admissions to Ph.D. programs are based on the entrance exam and interview conducted by the University. Following are the steps one should follow to apply for Andhra University admissions:

basic_info.name: Andhra University Placement
description: Andhra University Placement 2023 reports will be released soon. However, as per Andhra University NIRF 2023 reports, the median package offered to UG (3-year) students is INR 3 LPA as per Andhra University Placements 2022. The median package offered to a PG (2-year student) was INR 6.5 LPA. The Top recruiters during Andhra University Placements 2022 were Google, TCS, Infosys, Amazon, etc. Following are the detailed statistics of Andhra University Placements:

basic_info.name: Andhra University Campus
description: Andhra University Campus is steadfast in its efforts to uphold standards in teaching and research, ensure proper character building and development among the students, encourage community development programs, and foster leadership in young men and women. The University comprises four AU Campuses. The AU campus at Kakinada (East Godavari District) has five Departments and the AU Campus at Etcherla (Srikakulam Dist) has Eleven Departments. The AU Campus at Tadepalli Gudem has four departments and AU Campus at Vizianagaram has five Departments.

Andhra University is spread over a sprawling campus of 422 acres dotted with 121 buildings of Academic, Administrative, and support services with a plinth area of about 20 lakhs sq.ft., and 324 staff quarters. Presently the University catering to the Educational needs of five green districts of Andhra Pradesh namely Visakhapatnam, East Godavari, West Godavari, Vizinagaram, and Srikakulam. Following are some of the facilities offered at Andhra University Campus:

basic_info.name: Andhra University Scholarships
description: Andhra University offers various government scholarships that enable students with good academic merit and low economic background to complete their education without worrying about finances. Following are some of the Andhra University Scholarships:

basic_info.name: Merit Social Welfare/ Tribal Welfare Scholarships
description: The eligible students have been provided merit social welfare/tribal welfare scholarships from the Govt. of Andhra Pradesh. The PG GATE-qualified students are given UGC/AICTE fellowships.

basic_info.name: BTH Merit Scholarships
description: The students are eligible to apply for the BTH Scholarship (Tuition fee waivers) program for further reduction on existing tuition fees for the fee movers for the BTH i.e. The selection for the BTH scholarship will be done as per the merit of academic excellence among all the international students. BTH Scholarships are subject to availability.

faqs.question: Ques.Does Andhra University offer Hostel facilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, Andhra University offers separate hostels for males and females on the Campus. The hostel rooms are spacious and are equipped with facilities such as Wifi, 24-hour water filter, and spacious bathrooms.

faqs.question: Ques.Does Andhra University offer advanced tech-based educational facilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, Andhra University has incorporated course curriculums with the latest ICT. this helps students learn faster and in an efficient manner.

faqs.question: Ques.What are the basic facilities offered by Andhra University?
faqs.answer: The basic facilities offered at the University are as follows:HostelLibraryLaboratoriesCanteenLibrarySports

faqs.question: Ques.What are the entrance exams considered at Andhra University?
faqs.answer: The institute accepts certain specific entrance exams for specific courses. They are as follows:AUCET and AUEET entrance exams for UG and PG courses.The University accepts national-level and state-level entrance tests as well. They also consider GATE exam rankings too.

faqs.question: Ques.Which companies are the major recruiters that come for placement drives at Andhra University?
faqs.answer: The major recruiters that come for placement drives at Andhra University are as follows:WiproInfosysTCSISRODRDOIRS

faqs.question: Ques.What are some special programs offered by Andhra University?
faqs.answer: The University offers several courses in UG and PG. It also offers some special programs in parasitology, marine fisheries, plant cytogenetics, hydrology, petroleum exploration studies, human genetics, nanosciences, and entomology.

faqs.question: Ques.What is the mode of admission at Andhra University?
faqs.answer: The mode of admission is online. Offline mode is not available for this college.

faqs.question: Ques.Does Andhra University provide hostel accommodation to students?
faqs.answer: Yes, the university provides hostel accommodation to its students as per their school of study. There are a total of 8 hostels, namely:Arts & Commerce HostelScience & Technology HostelEngineering HostelLadies Hostel, MaharanipetaLaw HostelResearch HostelEngineering Ladies HostelInternational Students Hostel

faqs.question: Ques.What are the Diploma and Certificate courses offered at Andhra University School of Distance Education?
faqs.answer: The diploma courses offered at Andhra University are:- Postgraduate Diploma in Management- Diploma in MusicThe certificate courses offered at Andhra University are:- PGDCPA- Computer certificate course

Section.name: About Andhra University
Section.description:
Andhra University (AU) is one of the oldest educational institutions in the country. It is also the first to be conceived as a residential and teaching-cum-affiliating University. The University Presently is Offering 313 Courses in Arts, Commerce, Management, Science & Technology, Engineering, Law, Pharmacy, and Education. The University has five constituent colleges and four AU Campuses. Presently, the University was ranked 43rd in the University category as per NIRF 2023 ranking. Andhra University has been accredited with an ‘A’ grade by NAAC. Also, the University’s School of Distance Education offers Courses ranging from Certificate Courses to Post Graduate and Professional Courses. Check: Andhra University Distance Education
Andhra University offers UG, PG, and Ph.D. courses in various disciplines. The University conducts the application process through online mode. Admission to UG and PG courses is based on merit in qualifying exams or state-level or university-level entrance examinations such as AUEET, AUSIB, AP ECET, AP EAPCET, etc. However, for the B.Arch program, national-level exams such as NATA scores are considered. Admissions to Andhra University Ph.D. programs are based on the entrance exam and interview conducted by the University. Read more about Andhra University Admissions 2024
Andhra University Placement 2023 reports will be released soon. However, as per Andhra University NIRF 2023 reports, the median package offered to UG (3-year) students is INR 3 LPA as per Andhra University Placements 2022. The median package offered to a PG (2-year student) was INR 6.5 LPA. The Top recruiters during Andhra University Placements 2022 were Google, TCS, Infosys, Amazon, etc. Check: Andhra University Placements
